title: A defected ground structure based ultra-compact wider bandwidth terahertz multiple-input multiple-output antenna for emerging communication systems
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Praveen Kumar, V. Sivakumar, Vidya Rao, Criss Tom George, Bhaskar Awadhiya, Yogeshwary Bommenahalli Huchegowda, Yashwanth Nanjappa
